parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Produce, control, and distribute symmetric cryptographic keys using {{ sc-12.2_prm_1 }} key management technology and processes.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: [SP 800-56A], [SP 800-56B], and [SP 800-56C] provide guidance on cryptographic key establishment schemes and key derivation methods. [SP 800-57-1], [SP 800-57-2], and [SP 800-57-3] provide guidance on cryptographic key management.
